job_description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced React Developer to join our team. As a React Developer, you will play a crucial role in the development and maintenance of our web applications. If you're passionate about creating user-friendly, efficient, and high-performing applications, we'd love to have you on board.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the development team to design and implement web applications using React.

Develop and maintain high-quality, reusable code.

Ensure the responsiveness and performance of applications.

Troubleshoot and debug issues to improve application stability.

Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a React Developer.

Strong proficiency in JavaScript and React.js.

Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux).

Knowledge of modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, ES6+).

Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.

Experience with Git and version control.

Strong problem-solving skills.

Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

Nice to Have:

Experience with server-side rendering (SSR).

Knowledge of other front-end technologies, such as Vue or Angular.

Experience with unit testing and test-driven development (TDD).

Experience with web performance optimization.

Qualifications: Proven experience as a React Developer
Strong proficiency in JavaScript and React.js
Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux)
Knowledge of modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, ES6+)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling
Experience with Git and version control
Strong problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
Experience with server-side rendering (SSR)
Knowledge of other front-end technologies, such as Vue or Angular
Experience with unit testing and test-driven development (TDD)
Experience with web performance optimization
Responsibilities: As a React Developer, you will play a crucial role in the development and maintenance of our web applications
Collaborate with the development team to design and implement web applications using React
Develop and maintain high-quality, reusable code
Ensure the responsiveness and performance of applications
Troubleshoot and debug issues to improve application stability
Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends

job_description: We are looking for a skilled React developer to create a modern and user-friendly website for our company. The ideal candidate should have experience in building websites using React and be familiar with modern web development practices. They should also have strong problem-solving skills and be able to collaborate effectively with a team. The developer will be responsible for designing and implementing the website's user interface, ensuring responsiveness across different devices, and optimizing performance. They should have a good understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The ability to work independently and meet deadlines is essential.

Qualifications: The ideal candidate should have experience in building websites using React and be familiar with modern web development practices
They should also have strong problem-solving skills and be able to collaborate effectively with a team
They should have a good understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
The ability to work independently and meet deadlines is essential
Responsibilities: The developer will be responsible for designing and implementing the website's user interface, ensuring responsiveness across different devices, and optimizing performance

job_description:
Have you developed large applications?

I need from 2 to 4 people who can take the project and complete it before 2025, I can tell you after signing the NDA

Description:

We are looking for a skilled freelance react.js developer to support our web development team. In this freelance role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase.

To ensure success as a freelance react.js developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. Ultimately, a top-class freelance react.js developer should be able to design and build modern user interface components to enhance application performance.

Freelance React.js Developer Responsibilities:
• Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
• Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
• Identifying web-based user interactions.
• Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
• Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
• Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
• Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
• Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
• Documenting application changes and developing updates.

Requirements:

Freelance React.js Developer Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.
• Previous experience working as a react.js developer.
• In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
• Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
• Experience with user interface design.
• Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
• Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
• Excellent troubleshooting skills.
• Excellent communication skills.
• Good project management skills.
• Ability to work remotely with team.

Qualifications: To ensure success as a freelance react.js developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications
Ultimately, a top-class freelance react.js developer should be able to design and build modern user interface components to enhance application performance
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field
Previous experience working as a react.js developer
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages
Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux
Experience with user interface design
Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest
Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software
Excellent troubleshooting skills
Excellent communication skills
Good project management skills
Ability to work remotely with team

You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase

job_title: React Developer for API Calls and Web App Finishing - Contract to Hire
job_description: We are looking for an experienced React developer who can assist us with API calls and finish our web app project. The successful candidate should have a strong understanding of React, as well as experience with API integration and building responsive web applications. The main responsibilities of this role will include making API calls to fetch and display data, implementing front-end components and features, and ensuring the app's responsiveness across different devices. This is a great opportunity to work on an exciting project and showcase your expertise in React development.

Qualifications: The successful candidate should have a strong understanding of React, as well as experience with API integration and building responsive web applications
Responsibilities: The main responsibilities of this role will include making API calls to fetch and display data, implementing front-end components and features, and ensuring the app's responsiveness across different devices

job_description:
Overview:

Acuity, Inc. has an immediate opening for a React Developer to join our engineering team

Are you a web developer with expertise developing quality code? Do you desire to make a difference and have an impact through the work that you create? If so, come join Acuity Youll work to develop applications within a cloud-based big data platform in an Agile development environment.

Acuity, Inc. is a leading technology consulting firm headquartered in Reston, VA that offers deep domain expertise to federal agencies whose missions center on serving and protecting the nations citizens, global reputation, and critical assets. Acuity is focused on building cutting-edge, functional IT solutions for many government agencies. We are a team of doers with a bias towards action and have a proven track record of implementing innovative technology solutions to solve complex challenges. We seek to break the stereotype of clunky government applications. Our innovative, collaborative, and rewarding work environment has earned repeat honors from the Washington Business Journals Best Places to Work (7x) and SmartCEO Corporate Culture Awards (3x).
Responsibilities:
• Create effectively tested, re-usable, and efficient JavaScript code.
• Develop mission critical user interfaces.
• Support continuous improvement by staying up-to-date on front-end technology.
• Work collaboratively with a team in an Agile environment.
• Guide teams of developers (and non-developers) to the completion of successful projects.
Qualifications:

Basic Qualifications:
• Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or a related field.
• 2 years of professional experience using React.
• Experience with Jest/Enzyme or equivalent tools.
• Expertise with Git.
• Experience working in an agile environment (Scrum preferred) as part of a cross-functional team.
• Strong communication skills.
• Professional experience with Test Driven Development and performing code reviews.

Desired:
• Knowledge of accessibility/UX best practices and Section 508 compliance, and/or WCAG 2.0 standards
• Willing to learn React Native

Clearance Requirements:
• Must be US Citizen and be able to obtain and maintain a DHS Suitability

About Acuity, Inc

Acuity is a leading management and technology consulting firm that specializes in serving the federal government. Our innovative, collaborative and rewarding work environment has earned repeat honors from the Washington Business Journals Best Places to Work and SmartCEO Corporate Culture awards.

We are an equal employment opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.

Qualifications: Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or a related field
2 years of professional experience using React
Experience with Jest/Enzyme or equivalent tools
Expertise with Git
Strong communication skills
Professional experience with Test Driven Development and performing code reviews
Must be US Citizen and be able to obtain and maintain a DHS Suitability
Responsibilities: Create effectively tested, re-usable, and efficient JavaScript code
Develop mission critical user interfaces
Support continuous improvement by staying up-to-date on front-end technology
Work collaboratively with a team in an Agile environment
Guide teams of developers (and non-developers) to the completion of successful projects
